CONNECTION.DISPLAYSETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Settings of the ILI9341 (SPI) 240x320 display module.
CONNECTION.GPIO_DC_DOC: The DC GPIO pin to which this pin connects on the Raspberry Pi.
CONNECTION.GPIO_RST_DOC: The RESET GPIO pin to which this pin connects on the Raspberry Pi.
CONNECTION.GPIO_LED_DOC: The LED GPIO pin to which this pin connects on the Raspberry Pi.

DISPLAY_SETTINGS.DISPLAY_FONTFACE_DOC: Choose your font for displaying the data.
DISPLAY_SETTINGS.DISPLAY_LANDSCAPE_DOC: Switch display to landscape orientation. If set enabled the content will be rotated 90Â° counter clockwise.
DISPLAY_SETTINGS.COVER_FULLSCREEN_DOC: Show album cover in fullscreen. Only used if landscape is turned off.
DISPLAY_SETTINGS.COVER_WIDTH_DOC: Size of cover in pixel. It will be used for width and height and obviously only if cover fullscreen is disabled. Default: 80
DISPLAY_SETTINGS.COVER_TRANSPARENCY_DOC: Transparency of cover. Only used if cover fullscreen is enabled. Default: 30%

SERVICE.RESTART_DOC: Sometimes the display fails or doesn't show anything anymore. You can restart the display service here.
